name: Melega
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
Melega (Marco) is the flagship utility token of melega.finance, the new AMM DEX on Binance Smart Chain (BSC) providing friendly trading and better project support. 
A total black design, an original name, a distinctive and recognizable logo are the symbol of a project that intends to differentiate itself from the other amm dex by focusing more on the promotion of new gems than on consolidated projects with always new and innovative services.
